title: the deleted flavor data can be get

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~nati-ueno

comments.content:
Commit 5b866f3a ensures that a missing flavor (indicated by a FlavorNotFound exception) results in an HTTPNotFound exception (404), and includes a unit test for this behaviour.

See : https://review.openstack.org/#change,2854
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~maru
